valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Mon 15 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Tue 16 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 965 moving rather quickly east and losing its identity by midnight tonight. New low expected Spain 1001 by same time
